page.title: 09Marston Village
page.content:
Marston Montgomery is quaint place, with many features including an annual well dressing, a fish and chip/bingo night and many other events. There is an art society and book club. There are many things here naturalists will love, from a range of fields to the running brook. A wealth of history is also locked in this village, our most famous one being the chruch of our saint St Giles. Anyone who is looking for a quiet break in the countryside should think about taking a break here!
Jack Waldron
Contribution by: Jack Waldron
